website_summaries.verdict: Among wrist-worn activity trackers, the Fitbit Flex is the best and most competitively priced one you'll find. If you're not stuck on wearing a bracelet, though, the Flex's close cousin, the Fitbit One, is the obvious choice.
pros: Interchangeable bands available in several colors
Bluetooth and NFC-enabled wireless syncing to smartphones
cons: Limited display of information on device

customer_reviews.title: Loved my first one hate this one. Same FITBIT
customer_reviews.text: I got a fitbit for my birthday and loved it. Then it died. So I bought this one and it will not communicate consistently with my smartphone. There is a new up date so I do not know my steps and if I do not snap the fitbit every night, it will no longer record my sleep patterns. So no mileage, no sleep info and I wonder why I am wearing it. I have uninstalled it on my phone to see if the old fitbit program was interfering and reinstalled it. That did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: I loved my Fitbit
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Fitbit...until it broke. one of the lights stopped lighting up and the Fitbit no longer communicated with the app. So I thought it was a fluke and bought another one at Best Buy. The same thing happened within the year. I will not buy another one. It is too expensive to be so flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Fiction Fan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Bracelet Design
customer_reviews.text: Terrible bracelet design. Have lost two Fitbits from them falling off without me knowing it. Bracelet really needs to be redesigned. Fitbit itself great but bracelet terrible. Don't expect to have it for long!!
customer_reviews.author: Cocowood

customer_reviews.title: everyone should have one of these to keep track of ...
customer_reviews.text: everyone should have one of these to keep track of daily activity and when that 10,000 step buzz starts, you know you've done more than what you thought you could in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so unhappy with this product. I received this as a Christmas present. The first week, the band broke. Now the Fitbit Flex will not work and of course, the company states that it is after the return policy time. What a waste of money. A product should last longer than 8 months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Redheadkidzmom

customer_reviews.title: Great FitBit!
customer_reviews.text: I love my FitBit, wished that I had bought a more advance one.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen GeBorde-Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like that it had easy instructions and set up. Simply charge the battery and go. I wish I would have looked around though because a watch on it would be nice. But it syncs to my phone so I get my steps and my sleeping pattern. I recommend this fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: Meg2007

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Once I downloaded the Fit Bi app to my iPhone, I really started enjoying the Fit Bit Flex! The app provides a daily dashboard that keeps track of my steps and active calorie burn and also allows me to document my exercise, food intake, and sleeping patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Corell Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Tells me it is so easy to use and has all the features she was ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this Christmas I gave her. Tells me it is so easy to use and has all the features she was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: D. Logan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Could never get this to work properly. In now lives in my dresser drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it! Definitely keeps you honest. Take note, though, if you have any rocking chairs in your home you can rack up a ton of "false" steps. Learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: darock

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: Does not sync I see many reviews have the same problem. All your paying for is a 100 $ app and rubber braclet. Save your money what a waste
customer_reviews.author: matt naught

customer_reviews.title: I don't think it is very accurate. It will ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it is very accurate. It will go off with all the buzzes and flashing lights by just sitting in a rocking chair.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Third charge and it died
customer_reviews.text: I had the Flex for 2 weeks, I loved it! Then I need to charge it for the third time since I started wearing it and it wouldn't charge. I tried buying a new charger, nothing worked. For the price that is totally unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Housekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It has helped me be more aware of what I'm eating and how much I'm walking everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: great tool, needs recharging weekly
customer_reviews.text: So far my wife loves it. It needs recharging weekly, which is a lot more than the fitbit zip.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel D. Self

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: gave it as a gift don't know anything about this
customer_reviews.author: P Earnest

customer_reviews.title: Jury is out. Did not work. Had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Jury is out. Did not work. Had to return it. Waiting for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Jan Koster

customer_reviews.title: it is pretty great, but so disappointing when it is not
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't. When it is working, it is pretty great, but so disappointing when it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Widick

customer_reviews.title: Best investment in "ME" I've made in years!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to feed off of friends & watch myself improve daily! Such fun! :)
customer_reviews.author: Molly Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fitBit.3 weeks into it would not hold a charge for more than 30 minutes. In 24 hours had to charge the flex 3 times. Three and a half hours at a time. Very disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Fast shipping and the fitbit meets all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McLean

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying it!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying it! It is making me think more about what I am doing. Wish I would have gotten the watch one though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Watson

customer_reviews.title: It is a fun project in that you can share/compete with others though
customer_reviews.text: As others have pointed out, this only works when your arm is moving. As I do not swing my arms much at a normal pace, not all my steps are counted. On the flip side however, I one time reached my 10k steps for the day while blow drying my hair. I was standing still but my arm was moving.......... It is a fun project in that you can share/compete with others though.
customer_reviews.author: gone50

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the product, FITBIT Flex, inaccurate steps and doesn't account for exercising - circuit. CRAP plastic gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ordered this item ,ordered it before so I decided to buy it as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed. I need to track my sleep because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed. I need to track my sleep because I get so.little of it. I thought I could with this device but no paper work to tell me how. A waste.of.money.
customer_reviews.author: rita m radecker

customer_reviews.title: I wasted $97.
customer_reviews.text: The battery quit working after two weeks. I did not use when first received so amazon would not let me return because it was one day late.. I wasted $97.00
customer_reviews.author: Katie Willis

customer_reviews.title: Not very precise
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the accuracy of the steps, I'm not I wasn't doing 10,000 per day.... I move my arms a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This tracks your arm movements not steps. I sit all day at my job and move my arms. In 3 hours I had 10,000 steps. Not acurate at all! Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Showalter

customer_reviews.title: ... keeping track of activity - the computer interface is great. Still have things to explore though - such ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying keeping track of activity - the computer interface is great. Still have things to explore though - such as sleep monitoring. Very easy to use, synch and recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Handshue

customer_reviews.title: ... count more steps than possibly walked but I do like having something to motivate me
customer_reviews.text: It seems to count more steps than possibly walked but I do like having something to motivate me. Wish it has a watch on it to tell time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Greats product
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to use had battery issue and Firbit replaced within 5 days. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Robert Malin

customer_reviews.title: I like this Flex very much
customer_reviews.text: I like this Flex very much. It is a good tool for me to get fit. I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Merrie

customer_reviews.title: Best accessory anyone can wear...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to my daily routine. I have been in a plateau with my workouts and weight loss, and even just trying to hit the goal of 10K steps a day has helped me to get back on track and motivated to do all I can to reach that goal. It's easy to use and I wear it all day (except I do not shower with it), and never even feel that it is on! The only thing I don't like is that because you're supposed to wear it on you non-dominant hand, I no longer wear a watch, so I may not know what time it is, but I feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The band is sometimes difficult to snap ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The band is sometimes difficult to snap closed but after a couple weeks it got easier to snap.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Thomas

customer_reviews.title: For the price it should have given better options & better instructions
customer_reviews.text: For the price it should have given better options & better instructions.Could've monitored several of the options myself since you have to do the calculating manually. The sleep logon is difficult to turn on & off with ease. I usually have to beat the crap out of it to get it to respond. Wish I'd have just bought a pedometer & didn't get sucked into this latest craze.
customer_reviews.author: Jilan

customer_reviews.title: So far he has loved the simplicity of the FITBIT and the motivation it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my husband who has been wanting to increase his activity. So far he has loved the simplicity of the FITBIT and the motivation it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Condra

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed with FITBIT. I am returning the second one that I bought.
customer_reviews.text: The fitbit was the rage this Christmas, but we found it not to be as user friendly as it stated. The little latch that is supposed to be so easy to use will not fastened easily. I have to try and try to get it on. It becomes very frustrating. There is no indicator that I am aware of that tells you when it needs to charged other than the battery is completely dead. Logging in food, weight, calories, is not very easy to use. The sleep patterns seems to work fine, but now I question its accuracy. The little plastic snap into place latch is cheap and never holds well.
customer_reviews.author: Patti SmalleyAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its great. I look forward to meeting my goal daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it at all
customer_reviews.text: Too difficult to put on. I don't feel that it is accurate. Don't like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, does exactly what it's supposed to do....
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Milioto

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It works. If you want to keep track of your steps, your sleep, need a silent alarm, etc. ---- this is the product for you. It works. I like it. The rubber wrist band doesn't do much for me but oh well. It syncs nicely with the app and I am able to check it on my iphone, my ipad, and my laptop. So full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Lin N.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Positive reinforcement for lifelong couch potato go tech and get moving
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift that served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas as he often complains that he doesn't get a good night's sleep when I don't and hear him snoring all night. It was a challenge to set it up but he seems to be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I have not been happy with it at all and since I ordered it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is meant for someone who is tech savvy and I am not. It came with absolutely no directions at all. I was able to get it to work with the help of a friend. It is very hard to fasten on and does not work all of the time. The battery needs charging a lot. I have not been happy with it at all and since I ordered it online, it will be hard to return.
customer_reviews.author: BPhillips

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product to help keeping track of you activity and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to help keeping track of you activity and encouraging you to keep on keeping on!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lyall

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Package did not include the recharge station so it's useless and I'll send it back
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: a little disappointed in this but I like that I can wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been tracking this with my phones step tracker, this device logs in more steps than the phone. I measured the mileage by car and the phone is right on, a little disappointed in this but I like that I can wear it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: mammie3

customer_reviews.title: Needs a low battery alert
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would flash or vibrate when the battery is low. When I don't check the app or my emails, I sometimes walk around with a dead battery and not recording my progress.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: But this one sucks. I used my watch to record how many ...
customer_reviews.text: I lost the previous one which was accurate recording the time I used to walk every day. But this one sucks. I used my watch to record how many minutes I work every noon. Today I walked 43 minutes with more than 4 miles per hours speed. but the Fitbit just recorded 16 very active minutes and less than 2 miles. Horrible experience!!!
customer_reviews.author: MegaNJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Only problem I've had was with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only problem I've had was with the start up on my Mac; had to download the app to my phone to register.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave to daughters, grandchildren for Christmas they are very competitive edge with each other .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need a better way to track or edit active mom.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of wearing it to track my steps. I am disappointed that it does otters k firming activities or riding my stationary bike. These area five minutes too. I think there shod be a way for me to add active minutes to the dashboard since it does it count these activities. I live inAL where winters are6 months long. I exercise I my home most of those months
customer_reviews.author: Hess

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my fitbit
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my fitbit! I have been so much more active now that I have a quick way to track. LOVE the sleep feedback too. If you are debating on which fitbit to get the FLEX does the most for all populations and is the most affordable. Most of us should be less concerned with heart rate unless your a serious athlete and then you would not be buying the fitbit but something more complicated/detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wright

customer_reviews.title: Concerns
customer_reviews.text: I found the sleep pattern function to be extremely difficult and confusing. Very disappointing! Would like a "help desk" to contact when I have questions or concerns about the Fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID L.

customer_reviews.title: 2 of 2 -- BAD RATINGS!
customer_reviews.text: Unable to program it. Finally called customer services- - which by the way took and act of the high heavens to find the phone # to call -- spent 45 minutes on hold and another 45 minutes addressing the issue only to find out I had received a defective FITBIT. So, 2 of 2 -- BAD RATINGS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: ... if you have carpel tunnel or don't have a smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this if you have carpel tunnel or don't have a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lil F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for helping meet goals
customer_reviews.text: I think this is an amazing device that helps you want to stick to the goals you have set. It has definitely helped me stay on track with my health and fitness!
customer_reviews.author: N. Popat

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Love my FitBit, it is a great tool on how much I walk and how I sleep. I would like eventually to see one that measures heart rate.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gradillas

customer_reviews.title: You can loose weight with this baby!
customer_reviews.text: Best one yet! This little baby will tell you a lot about yourself. Try it and it will become part of you,
customer_reviews.author: James Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Shop carefully to ensure you're getting what you want
customer_reviews.text: I expected this product to show on the band, your output information. However, it does not. Always have to go to your Iphone to see your results. Product is fair to good.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. White

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought the FITBIT for my wife, so I truly can't say much about it. I do know she love's it and wears it daily. She loves that it tracks her sleep patterns accurately and monitors all her activities. It seems to work flawlessly and she enjoys keeping up with all the stats with her iPad and iPhone. It is really a nice product that she says is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rand

customer_reviews.title: Not al as advertised. .
customer_reviews.text: Received it a week later than the promised delivery date. Instructions not that clear. Only had it one day. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you read the fine print on their return policy
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the fine print on their return policy. The monitor is off by a 1/2 mile when walking. I returned it and was not provided my full refund. They charge a 10% restocking fee. Very disappointed in this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pieper

customer_reviews.title: Where is the clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the Fitbit Flex i had trouble figuring it out. I printed out the product manual, all 32 pages, not to sure if it was worth it. Since I am considered a "senior", I think 10,000 steps a day, every day is a bit much. The information sent to my computer is incorrect. Today, I did not put the Fit Bit on, I got an e mail congratulating me on walking 5,000 steps today, go figure. Also the strap is cute, got 3 colors, but difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.author: ML Hill

customer_reviews.title: Have not used it yet.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't use it yet, but expect it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim
